tasks.label: Package Extension
args: Write-Host 'Packaging YouTube Speed Booster Extension...'; $version = (Get-Content manifest.json | ConvertFrom-Json).version; $zipName = "youtube-speed-booster-v$version.zip"; if (Test-Path $zipName) { Remove-Item $zipName }; Compress-Archive -Path 'manifest.json', 'src', 'assets', 'pages' -DestinationPath $zipName; Write-Host "Extension packaged as: $zipName" -ForegroundColor Green; Write-Host 'Ready for Chrome Web Store upload!' -ForegroundColor Cyan
